title: Colonist
description:
Can do any type of work, but is not very good at it.
Can use only wooden tools.
Can't fall tall trees
Can't provide any food.

title: Miner - LVL1
description:
Can work in mine and quarry.
Can use stone shovel and pickaxe.
unlockMessage: Build 'Wooden Miner's house' to unlock
unlockMoreMessage: Build more 'Wooden Miner's houses' to unlock more

title: Miner - LVL2
description:
Can work in mine and quarry.
Can use iron shovel and pickaxe.
unlockMessage: Build 'Stone Miner's house' to unlock
unlockMoreMessage: Build more 'Stone Miner's houses' to unlock more

title: Miner - LVL3
description:
Can work in mine and quarry.
Can use diamond shovel and pickaxe.
unlockMessage: Build 'Miners' guild house' to unlock
unlockMoreMessage: Build more 'Miners' guild houses' to unlock more

title: Lumberjack - LVL1
description:
Can fall tall trees.
Can use stone axe.
Collects saplings.
unlockMessage: Build 'Wooden Lumberjack's house' to unlock
unlockMoreMessage: Build more 'Wooden Lumberjack's houses' to unlock more

title: Lumberjack - LVL2
description:
Can fall tall trees.
Can use iron axe.
Can plant saplings.
unlockMessage: Build 'Stone Lumberjack's house' to unlock
unlockMoreMessage: Build more 'Stone Lumberjack's houses' to unlock more

title: Lumberjack - LVL3
description:
Can fall tall trees.
Can use diamond axe.
Can plant saplings.
unlockMessage: Build 'Lumberjack's guild house' to unlock
unlockMoreMessage: Build more 'Lumberjack's guild houses' to unlock more

title: Forester
description:
Collects seeds, apples and some other basic food
While working every tick has small chance of getting food.
Collects saplings and sticks.
unlockMessage: Brings food. Build 'Forester's house' to unlock
unlockMoreMessage: Build more 'Forester's houses' to unlock more

title: Hunter
description:
Can use bow.
Defends village from monsters.
Hunts monsters.
Can work at night
unlockMessage: Will be available in future updates

title: Fisherman
description:
Catches fish in ponds
Cooks fish
unlockMessage: Will be available in future updates

title: Farmer
description: Plants any kind of seeds including wheat, watermelon and pumpkin
unlockMessage: Build any farm to unlock
unlockMoreMessage: Build more farms to hire more

title: Baker
description: Bakes bread, cakes and other food
unlockMessage: Will be available in future releases

title: Shepherd
description:
Brings pigs, sheeps and cows to the village.
Provides milks, wool and meat
unlockMessage: Will be available in future releases

title: Stableman
unlockMessage: Will be available in future releases

title: Butcher
unlockMessage: Will be available in future releases

title: Cook
unlockMessage: Will be available in future releases

title: Craftsman
description:
Can craft any item that doesn't need smelting.
Can't use redstone or nether blocks/items
unlockMessage: Build crafting table to unlock
unlockMoreMessage: Build more crafting tables to unlock more

title: Leather Worker - LVL1
unlockMessage: Will be available in future releases

title: Leather Worker - LVL2
unlockMessage: Will be available in future releases

title: Blacksmith
description: Can smelt ores and cook food in furnace
unlockMessage: Build any blueprint with a Furnace to unlock
unlockMoreMessage: Build more blueprints with Furnaces to unlock more

title: Armorer
unlockMessage: Will be available in future releases

title: Weaver
unlockMessage: Will be available in future releases

title: Tailor
unlockMessage: Will be available in future releases

title: Warrior - LVL1
description: Defends the village, can use stone sword and leather armor [1 stone sword for each]
unlockMessage: Build Small Warrior's house to unlock
unlockMoreMessage: You need more stone swords or build another Small Warrior's house to hire more!

title: Warrior - LVL2
description: Defends the village, can use iron sword and iron armor [1 iron sword for each, 1 iron armor set for each]
unlockMessage: Build Medium Warrior's house to unlock
unlockMoreMessage: You need more iron swords/armors or build another Medium Warrior's house to hire more!

title: Archer
description: Defends the village, ranged fighter [1 bow, 32 arrow for each]
unlockMessage: Build Shooting gallery to unlock
unlockMoreMessage: You need more bows/arrows to hire more!

title: Archer - LVL2
unlockMessage: Will be available in future releases

title: Knight - LVL1
description: Will be available in future releases

title: Knight - LVL2
description: Will be available in future releases
